betterquesting:10.desc:8: It is no simple matter to obtain §a§oterrasteel§r. The process can often be a lengthy one that is very time and mana consuming. The highest level of efficiency you will be able to obtain in crafting such a substance at the moment will be through the §9§oterrestrial agglomeration plate§r. This allows for a §9§b§omanasteel ingot§r§b§o§r, §b§omana diamond§r, §b§o§rand §b§omana pearl§r to be combined on top of it with the catalyst of approximately half a mana pool. See the §a§oLexica Botania§r for more information.
